description: Redevelopment by the erection of a building comprising ground floor 17 000 square feet to be used for any purpose within Use Classes A1 (retail) or B1 (office) with student hall of residence providing 370 study/bed rooms on first to sixth floors above.  Applicants Plan Nos:LO95/PO1D PO2D PO3C PO7B
decision_conditions: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
